# Untitled Short Film

This was a passion project with a good friend of mine from Lambda, it‚Äôs for a series of ‚Äòmusic videos‚Äô for 3 poems.

# The Offering - Short Film

A short film I was the DoP on. Currently ungraded, with only the monitoring LUT on, this will look quite different when the short is released.

![Photo.jpeg](Cinematography%20Stills%20f20f961cd7624219b373fe2baad3c5e1/Photo.jpeg)

# Naked  (Freya Roy) - Music Video

Music Video for Dan Franklin (October Studios).

Using a massive LED light to simulate daylight in a corridor set within October‚Äôs studios. As well as RGB LED tubes that we hid around the set, and even used as key lights for the mirror shot, you can also spot them under the cover for the shadows in the bed.

![face still.png](Cinematography%20Stills%20f20f961cd7624219b373fe2baad3c5e1/face_still.png)

# Art in the City - Short Film

Written and shot by me, this romantic look at how powerful art can be is a celebration of the community I am so proud to be a part of here in Norwich.

![Thumbnail_Final.png](Cinematography%20Stills%20f20f961cd7624219b373fe2baad3c5e1/Thumbnail_Final.png)

![Screenshot 2022-06-10 at 14.38.png](Cinematography%20Stills%20f20f961cd7624219b373fe2baad3c5e1/Screenshot_2022-06-10_at_14.38.png)
